message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic deal for $120.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think the product is worth more than $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm happy to pay $95, which is closer to my budget and a fair compromise.  Let me know if you're open to that.
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob! I can do $105, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but still a good compromise. Let me know if you're willing to meet me there.
Alice, we're getting closer! I'm willing to go up to $102, but that's my final offer. If it's not acceptable, I'll have to go with John's offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $102, Bob, but I think I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. Let me know if that works for you.
